changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: Create REPORT_OUTPUT_TYPES

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: Create REPORTS

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORTS ADD FOREIGN KEY (REPORT_OUTPUT_TYPE) REFERENCES REPORT_OUTPUT_TYPES(id)

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: Create REPORT_GROUPS

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORT_GROUPS ADD FOREIGN KEY (REPORT_ID) REFERENCES REPORTS(id)

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: Create REPORT_QUERIES

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORT_QUERIES ADD FOREIGN KEY (REPORT_ID) REFERENCES REPORTS(id)

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: Create FIELD_ATTRIBUTES

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.FIELD_ATTRIBUTES ADD FOREIGN KEY (REPORT_QUERY_ID) REFERENCES REPORT_QUERIES(id)

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: Create REPORTS_TRACKING

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORTS_TRACKING ADD FOREIGN KEY (REPORT_ID) REFERENCES REPORTS(id)

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: make REPORTS.REPORT_CREATOR_ID nullable
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORTS MODIFY REPORT_CREATOR_ID NULL

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: make REPORTS.REPORT_CREATOR_NAME nullable
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORTS MODIFY REPORT_CREATOR_NAME NULL

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: make REPORTS.REPORT_CREATOR_EMAIL nullable
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORTS MODIFY REPORT_CREATOR_EMAIL NULL

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: make REPORTS.TEMPLATE_SECURE_DOCUMENT_ID nullable
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORTS MODIFY TEMPLATE_SECURE_DOCUMENT_ID NULL

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: add REPORTS.FILE_NAME
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORTS ADD COLUMN FILE_NAME VARCHAR(150)

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: add REPORTS.ACTIVE
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.REPORTS ADD COLUMN ACTIVE CHAR(1)

changeSet.author: jason smallman
changeSet.comment: make FIELD_ATTRIBUTES.COLUMN_WIDTH a double
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE GPFD.FIELD_ATTRIBUTES ALTER COLUMN COLUMN_WIDTH DECIMAL(20,2)
